name: Re-order team icons on the team sidebar

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description: Log into a server where user belongs to multiple team
inline.expectedResult: 1. Cursor changes to grabbing cursor, user can re-order team icons in the team sidebar by dragging and dropping

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• (Story) Drag and Drop to reorder team sidebar — MM-18527
  • WebApp: Drag handle should transition out of view when dragging to reorder teams — MM-23441
  • WebApp: Team switcher shortcut conflicts with Safari's "navigate-to-favorite" shortcuts — MM-23638

inline.description: Click on a team and drag and drop it to a different position
inline.expectedResult:
• Selected state bar transitions to hover handle and out of the view on drag, reappears when drag is released    
  • Secondary team icons do not move until the icon being moved crosses it's midpoint 
  • At this time, the drag is not contained with the vertical axis (acceptable)

inline.description: Verify teams with unread posts display an unread dot (top right corner)
inline.expectedResult: 3. Unread notification dot is present on the team with unreads, remains visible on hover

inline.description: Try to drag the Other teams you can join `+` icon
inline.expectedResult: Verify it's stationary, and can't be moved
• New teams are added above the + icon

inline.description: Verify keyboard shortcut will change based on the new position
inline.expectedResult: • if Team 1 was dragged to position 2, then Team 2 now becomes Team 1 and Team 1 becomes Team 2 in terms of keyboard shortcuts.

inline.description: Use cmd+alt(option)+# or cmd+alt(option)+ ˄˅ arrow to switch teams
inline.expectedResult: Able to use Keyboard shortcuts to switch the teams
